ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch

Class NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.MaxCategoryUtilitySearcherDecorator
      • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.treesearch.NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher, java.io.Serializable

    public class NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher
extends MaxCategoryUtilitySearcherDecorator
implements java.io.Serializable
    Decorates a IMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher by removing potential merges from combinationIds that do not share a ratings attribute.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        Determines if a de-serialized file is compatible with this class.

        Maintainers must change this value if and only if the new version of this class is not compatible with old versions.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • combinationsIndicesWithSharedAttributes

        private gnu.trove.set.TIntSet combinationsIndicesWithSharedAttributes
        Keeps track of combinations which have been identified as combinations with shared nodes. These combinations won't be tested on shared attributes in a subsequent clustering cycle again. This means that combination id's contained in this set will never be removed from the set of combinations passed to @code{getMaxCategoryUtilityMerges} to calculate its category utility by this decorator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher

        public NoCommonRatingAttributeSkipMaxCUSearcher(IMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher decoratedSearcher)

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxCategoryUtilityMerges

        public gnu.trove.map.TIntDoubleMap getMaxCategoryUtilityMerges(gnu.trove.set.TIntSet combinationIds,
                                                      IClusterSetIndexed<INode> clusterSet)
        Removes from combinationIds potential merges of nodes that do not share a rating attribute in order to reduce the number of calculations to perform. If combinationIds.size() < 2 no more combination ids are removed.
        Specified by:
        getMaxCategoryUtilityMerges in interface IMaxCategoryUtilitySearcher
        Parameters:
        combinationIds - the node combination id's to test.
        clusterSet - the node set of the current clustering cycle
        Returns:
        A mapping of combination id's to the category utility of the merge.
